comments.body: Is this package public? e.g., `download_uri` and `parse_s3_uri`?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@from six.moves import urllib

from mlflow.utils import process

DBFS_PREFIX = "dbfs:/"

comments.body: orthogonal, but adds support for recursively downloading. Overwrite seems scary; I don't think we were using that behavior anyway.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@def _fetch_dbfs(uri, local_path):
    print("=== Downloading DBFS file %s to local path %s ===" % (uri, os.path.abspath(local_path)))
    process.exec_cmd(cmd=["databricks", "fs", "cp", "-r", uri, local_path])
